clusters = []


for i in range(1,11):
    kmeans = KMeans(n_clusters= i, init='k-means++', random_state=0)
    kmeans.fit(X)
    clusters.append(kmeans.inertia_)


plt.plot(range(1,11),clusters)
plt.title('Elbow Method')
plt.xlabel('no of clusters')
plt.ylabel('Inertia')
plt.show()
